dialogue.speaker: Guardian Angel
dialogue.text: Welcome, mortal, to the realm of Eternity. I have been sent to guide you on your journey.

dialogue.speaker: Mortal Hero
dialogue.text: What lies ahead? What challenges will I face in this mystical realm?

dialogue.speaker: Guardian Angel
dialogue.text: You shall encounter ancient ruins, treacherous landscapes, and formidable enemies. But fear not, for you possess the courage and wisdom to overcome them.
